org.araneaframework.uilib.tree
Interface TreeNodeContext

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
TreeNodeWidget
public interface TreeNodeContext
extends java.io.Serializable

Tree node context. General interface that can be used to access current tree node configuration.

Since:
1.0.7
Author:
Alar Kvell (alar@araneaframework.org)

Method Summary

          Returns the display widget of this tree node.
 int getIndex()
          Returns the index this node has under its parent.
 TreeNodeContext getNode(int index)
          Returns a child node of this tree node.

Method Detail

isCollapsed

public boolean isCollapsed()
Returns if tree node is collapsed (children hidden).

setCollapsed

public void setCollapsed(boolean collapsed)
Sets collapsed state of tree node. If true, child nodes are hidden, otherwise child nodes are shown. This may trigger removal or retrieval of child nodes using TreeDataProvider if TreeContext.isRemoveChildrenOnCollapse() is true.

toggleCollapsed

public void toggleCollapsed()
Inverts collapsed state of tree node, collapsing expanded node and vice versa.

renderNode

public void renderNode(OutputData data)
                throws java.lang.Exception
Renders tree node and all of its children to specified OutputData. Could be called from action listener of tree node display widget.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception

getNodeCount

public int getNodeCount()
Returns the number of child nodes this tree node has. The display widget is not counted as a child node.

addNode

public int addNode(TreeNodeWidget node)
Adds the given node as the last child node of this tree node.

Parameters:
node - child node to be added.
Returns:
index of the added child node.

addNode

public void addNode(int index,
                    TreeNodeWidget node)
Adds the given node to the specified position. Moves all subsequent nodes one position further.

Parameters:
index - Position of the added node
node - Node to add

removeNode

public TreeNodeWidget removeNode(int index)
Removes child node at the specified position.

Parameters:
index - Position of the removed node
Returns:
Node that was removed

addAllNodes

public void addAllNodes(java.util.List nodes)
Appends all given nodes to this tree node.

Parameters:
nodes - list of TreeNodeWidgets to be added.

removeAllNodes

public void removeAllNodes()
Removes all child nodes of this tree node.

getDisplayWidget

public Widget getDisplayWidget()
Returns the display widget of this tree node. Root node of the tree (TreeWidget) has no display widget (getDisplayWidget() is null).

getNode

public TreeNodeContext getNode(int index)
Returns a child node of this tree node.

Parameters:
index - index of the returned child node.

getNodes

public java.util.List getNodes()
Returns all child nodes of this tree node.

Returns:
list of TreeNodeWidgets.

hasNodes

public boolean hasNodes()
Returns if this tree node has any child nodes.

getParentCount

public int getParentCount()
Returns how many parent nodes this TreeNodeWidget has. TreeWidget (root node) has zero parents, it's immediate children have one parent, etc.

Returns:
number of parents in hierarchy.

getParentNode

public TreeNodeContext getParentNode()
Returns parent node of this tree node or null if called on the root node.

getIndex

public int getIndex()
Returns the index this node has under its parent.
